column1: 27299,X-Men Forever (2009) #10,10,22274,94,"""The Secret History of The Sentinels"" The thrilling conclusion to the X-Men's South American adventure!!! The X-Men take on this newest threat while still reeling from the revelations of the last issue - and the reappearance of the Trask family! PLUS! The funeral of WOLVERINE. The X-Men put to rest their team member and friend. Penciled by Paul Smith and inked by Terry Austin! Rated A ...$3.99",
